name: Hubspot
description: Download CRM objects data from your Hubspot account.
instructions:
1. Create a Private App
    • In your HubSpot account, click the settings icon in the main navigation bar.
    • In the left sidebar menu, navigate to Integrations > Private Apps and Click Create private app.
    • On the Basic Info tab, configure the details of your app.
    • On the Scopes tab, configure the scopes of your app.
      • CRM
        • All "Read" Scopes
      • Standard
        • e-commerce
        • tickets
        • sales-email-read
    • click Create App in the top right, and copy your app's access token.
  2. Learn More about the Hubspot private app.
  3. In Bytespree, provide the Access token of the Hubspot private app you just created
  4. Finish database setup
known_limitations: Hubspot Private app API calls are subject to a limit of 100 requests every 10 seconds and 250,000 requests per day.

settings.name: access_token
settings.description: An Access Token issued by HubSpot Private App
